channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Open Source -- Walrus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Open Source -- Walrus

item.title: CVE-2024-32673|2024-08-02T02:13:40.468Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- walrus
item.description:
Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability in Samsung Open Source Walrus Webassembly runtime engine allows a segmentation fault issue.
This issue affects Walrus: before 72c7230f32a0b791355bbdfc78669701024b0956.
